group_1.textRight: You want us to come up with a Tanabata @menu together, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, Felicia and I wouldn't be able to get @anywhere on our own...

group_1.textRight: Why me, though?

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to get opinions from kids your age.
If the menu appeals to elementary schoolers, @their parents will probably bring them here!
So are you gonna help us or what?

group_1.textRight: Well...I don't know how much I can actually @help, but I'll try my best!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a bunch!
Alright, our theme is the best Chinese food @for Tanabata...that goes with this costume!

group_1.textRight: Wait, with that outfit...? But why?

group_1.textLeft: Since I performed in the drama for the @Tanabata Festival in Mizuna,
they agreed to take a photo of me in @this costume.
We're allowed to use it in a poster to @advertise Banbanzai.
It'll show off our special Tanabata menu!

group_1.textRight: Best part is, they're gonna put up the poster @at the actual festival!

group_1.textLeft: But my dad rejected my idea to decorate @Banbanzai for the occasion...

group_1.textRight: What was your idea?

group_1.narration: "Let's run a huge water lane @down the middle of the store, @as wide as our armspan!"
"It'll be the waterslide we use for flowing somen, @representing the Milky Way!"

group_1.textLeft: I call it...Milky Way Waterway Noodles!

group_1.textRight: Would the lane really be that wide…? @People wouldn't be able to reach the middle...
How would you catch the water pourin' out? @Buckets won't cut it. The store'll get flooded...

group_1.textLeft: Ugh, Dad said the same thing. I just know @it'd have a huge splash, publicity-wise...

group_1.textRight: ...Anyway, the menu should be focusing @on somen, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Somen and Tanabata go hand-in-hand!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Why is that?

group_1.narration: It's said that somen originates @from a snack called “sakubei,” or braided rice cakes. @It was brought over from China, and resembles a rope.

group_1.textLeft: They used to eat it on the seventh day of the @seventh month to wish for good health!
Over time, the rice braids became somen@in Japan, which is still eaten on Tanabata.

group_1.textRight: If somen originally came from sakubei... @Why not feature that on the menu?

group_1.textLeft: ...Would you still suggest that once you see @what sakubei looks like?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:101501:cheek_0][chara:101501:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101501:lipSynch_1]They kind of look like twisted donuts.

group_1.textLeft: They're so plain.
Yeah...they look like plain old donuts, and a @snack can't be the featured menu item.
So my idea was to put a Chinese spin on @traditional somen.
Do you have any ideas? Something that @would go with the Tanabata theme!

group_1.textRight: Erm...maybe you could make it look like@a Tanabata decoration?

group_1.textLeft: What d'you mean by that? Somethin' all fancy?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, if we put different ingredients on it, @I think it would look beautiful!

group_1.textLeft: It'll look great on the poster, too! @Now, what exactly should we add...

group_1.textRight: Meat! Don't forget the meat!
How about cutting omelets into strips that @look like wishing paper?

group_1.textLeft: Like wishing paper...[chara:100354:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100354:motion_000][chara:100354:cheek_0][chara:100354:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100354:lipSynch_1] Wishing omelets, then! @The color would be so beautiful, too.
Then I think we could add some tomatoes@for red, and cucumbers for green...

group_1.textRight: Um...what will you do for seasoning?

group_1.textLeft: I'd like to use somen soup as a base, with a Chinese-style twist to it...

group_1.textRight: You gotta pour on some sesame oil. @You use it a lot at Banbanzai, right?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100354:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You have a good eye for detail, but you @gotta think more elegantly!

group_1.textRight: Besides...since it's summer, something light @and refreshing would be good!

group_1.textLeft: Light and refreshing... Vinegar, maybe?
...Yay![chara:100354:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100354:motion_101][chara:100354:cheek_0][chara:100354:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100354:lipSynch_1]@I think we got something good going on!
Roast pork, omelet strips, tomatoes, @and cucumbers...
...We pulled it off, but it doesn't seem @very original.
...Yeah.
Wait, now that I think of it...
...isn't this just a regular chilled Chinese @noodle recipe, but with somen instead?

group_1.textRight: If that's what you say...then I guess so?

group_1.textLeft: I knew it! It really is just a plain old noodle dish, toppings and seasoning and all!

group_1.textCenter: Cool, then the star of the menu'll be @"Chilled Chinese Somen!"

group_1.textLeft: That's way too typical! @There's nothing that makes it unique!
We were better off with Milky Way Waterway @Noodles after all...

group_1.textCenter: That was a crappy idea, though. If you really @hate it, what else you got?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:100354:eyeClose_1][chara:100354:cheek_0][chara:100354:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100354:lipSynch_1]Nothing.

group_1.textRight: And besides, I think this is so good, too! @It's so yummy!

group_1.textLeft: Well...if you insist...then I guess I can have @the others give it a try and decide.
...What score would you give it?

group_1.textRight: I'd say at least an 80.

group_1.textLeft: With something so bog-standard?! I mean, @you could get this from anywhere!

group_1.textRight: I think it's such a staple because...it's so @perfect and satisfying.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.narration: Check out Banbanzai's summer menu! @Chilled Chinese Somen is now available!
We put that poster up at the Tanabata Festival @in Mizuna to advertise our new somen dish.
For the first time in ages, @we had a dish so tasty and popular @that tons of people came back @to have it over and over again...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:100354:eyeClose_1]It just...goes against all logic, though! @I don't get iiiiiiiiiit!!!
